com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport

Class CoreItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.CoreItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item, ItemPlaceholder

    public abstract class CoreItem
extends Object
    The core parts of an Item that are also common to ItemPlaceholders.

    Note: Starting at version 4.0 of the API, there are two different security mechanisms available, which apply on a per-Item basis. Before version 4.0, it was possible only to set and retrieve security permissions explicitly. At version 4.0, it is possible also to set security permissions implicitly, through the use of SecurityTags. It is possible to switch between the mechanisms on a live Item, but it is not possible to set explicit security permissions and SecurityTags at the same time.

    Since:
    1.0

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected CoreItem(ItemIdentifierAndVersion itemIdentifierAndVersion, SecurityAccessLevel accessLevel, SecurityGrantLevel grantLevel)
      Constructs a new CoreItem by initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> getAccessPermissions()
      Gets the SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem, which dictate the user permissions required to access the data.
      Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> getGrantPermissions()
      Gets the SecurityGrantPermissions for this CoreItem, which dictate the user permissions required to change the SecurityAccessPermissions.
      ItemIdentifierAndVersion getItemIdentifierAndVersion()
      Gets the ItemIdentifierAndVersion for this CoreItem.
      SecurityAccessLevel getSecurityAccessLevel()
      Gets the SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
      SecurityGrantLevel getSecurityGrantLevel()
      Gets the SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
      String getSecurityPermissionsSignpost()
      Gets a String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem.
      Collection<String> getSecurityTagIds()
      Gets Strings containing the identifiers of the SecurityTags for this CoreItem.
      boolean isNewerVersionAvailable()
      Indicates whether a newer version of this CoreItem exists in the data store.
      void setSecurityPermissionsSignpost(String securityPermissionsSignpost)
      Sets the indicator of whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem to the specified String.

      • CoreItem

        protected CoreItem(ItemIdentifierAndVersion itemIdentifierAndVersion,
                   SecurityAccessLevel accessLevel,
                   SecurityGrantLevel grantLevel)
        Constructs a new CoreItem by initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifierAndVersion - The ItemIdentifierAndVersion of the new CoreItem.
        accessLevel - The SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
        grantLevel - The SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemIdentifierAndVersion

        public final ItemIdentifierAndVersion getItemIdentifierAndVersion()
        Gets the ItemIdentifierAndVersion for this CoreItem.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getSecurityPermissionsSignpost

        public final String getSecurityPermissionsSignpost()
        Gets a String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • setSecurityPermissionsSignpost

        public final void setSecurityPermissionsSignpost(String securityPermissionsSignpost)
        Sets the indicator of whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem to the specified String.
        Parameters:
        securityPermissionsSignpost - A String containing the value to be set.

      • getSecurityAccessLevel

        public final SecurityAccessLevel getSecurityAccessLevel()
        Gets the SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
        Returns:
        See above, or null when the CoreItem is not being returned to a client.

      • getSecurityGrantLevel

        public final SecurityGrantLevel getSecurityGrantLevel()
        Gets the SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
        Returns:
        See above, or null when the CoreItem is not being returned to a client.

      • getAccessPermissions

        public final Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> getAccessPermissions()
        Gets the SecurityAccessPermissions for this CoreItem, which dictate the user permissions required to access the data.
        Returns:
        See above, or an empty collection if this CoreItem is using SecurityTags rather than explicit SecurityAccessPermissions, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityAccessPermissions (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).

      • getGrantPermissions

        public final Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> getGrantPermissions()
        Gets the SecurityGrantPermissions for this CoreItem, which dictate the user permissions required to change the SecurityAccessPermissions.
        Returns:
        See above, or an empty collection if this CoreItem is using SecurityTags rather than explicit SecurityGrantPermissions, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityGrantPermissions (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).

      • getSecurityTagIds

        public final Collection<String> getSecurityTagIds()
        Gets Strings containing the identifiers of the SecurityTags for this CoreItem.
        Returns:
        See above, or an empty collection if this CoreItem is using explicit security permissions rather than SecurityTags, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityTags (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).
        Since:
        4.0

      • isNewerVersionAvailable

        public final boolean isNewerVersionAvailable()
        Indicates whether a newer version of this CoreItem exists in the data store.
        Returns:
        true if there is a newer version of this CoreItem in the data store; false otherwise.
        Since:
        4.0
